branchCategory.name: Rodless Cylinder, MY1C, Mechanically Jointed - Cam Follower Guide
branchCategory.description: <p>The MY1C  Rodless Cylinders have a one-piece carriage and piston that runs its entire stroke length housed with an inner seal belt to maintain air pressure combined with an outer dust seal band to protect from contaminants. This design offers a compact footprint compared to rod-style cylinders. The integrated cam follower guide provides for smooth and precise slide table movement. Air cushions are standard and external shock absorbers are optional.</p>
